document_data.name: ''Mindshatter''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mindshatter''''' was a gargantuan [[battleaxe]] that was the [[weapon]] wielded by the [[avatar]] of [[Deep Duerra]], the [[duergar]] [[deity]] of [[psionics]] and conquest.<ref name=frcs-3e-p238">
document_data.Powers: This huge battleaxe had a ''+3'' enchantment. When it struck a creature, it would ''[[steal psionic strength|steal their psionic strength]]'' in great proportions.
